column1: Local Foods////Absolutely love local foods. Whenever friends come into town
column2: I always take them here and there have been zero complaints. I used to order the crunchy chicken religiously
column4: I've gravitated towards the garden sammie (sub with pretzel bun
column6: and always gotten the Kale salad side and whichever seasonal item looked interesting. Also
column7: the posole soup is really comforting - great if you're feeling sick!
